Samuel wrote:

> Hi all,
>
>
> The last couple of days I've been writing a Processor to write the
> results on a MySQL databse. Everything turned out to be ok so far,

Are you writing the whole capture to the db or just metadata?

> except the fact that I can't see the new processor I have created on
> the  modules section of Heritrix's web interface. Therefore, I cannot
> include it in the jobs. Any solutions?

Have you added it to the Processor.options file under src/conf/modules?  
(The developer manual makes mention that you need to do this but its a 
little buried as a 'Note' in this section: 
http://crawler.archive.org/articles/developer_manual.html#N10291).

>
> I've used Maven to build it but Im running it on Eclipse (any chances
> of a plugin of Maven 1.0.2 for Eclipse?) Im a bit new to Heritrix's
> architecture, so forgive my ignorance.

You'd like to be able to get to maven goals from eclipse?  I don't know 
of such a plugin but I'd imagine one likely exists.  Currently, there is 
intentionally no relation between the two builds other than that they 
both build to the target directory.

HTH,
St.Ack

> Thanks,
>
> Samuel Mendonca
